title: 新约 - 提多书(Titus) - 第 2 章
subTitle: 新约 -- 提多书(Titus) -- 第 2 章 ( 本篇共有 3 章 )

lineList.en: But speak thou the things which become sound doctrine:
lineList.cn: 但你所讲的，总要合乎那纯正的道理。

lineList.en: That the aged men be sober, grave, temperate, sound in faith, in charity, in patience.
lineList.cn: 劝老年人，要有节制，端庄，自守，在信心爱心忍耐上，都要纯全无疵。

lineList.en: The aged women likewise, that they be in behaviour as becometh holiness, not false accusers, not given to much wine, teachers of good things;
lineList.cn: 又劝老年妇人，举止行动要恭敬，不说谗言，不给酒作奴仆，用善道教训人。

lineList.en: That they may teach the young women to be sober, to love their husbands, to love their children,
lineList.cn: 好指教少年妇人，爱丈夫，爱儿女，

lineList.en: To be discreet, chaste, keepers at home, good, obedient to their own husbands, that the word of God be not blasphemed.
lineList.cn: 谨守贞洁，料理家务，待人有恩，顺服自己的丈夫，免得神的道理被毁谤。

lineList.en: Young men likewise exhort to be sober minded.
In all things shewing thyself a pattern of good works: in doctrine shewing uncorruptness, gravity, sincerity,
lineList.cn: 你自己凡事要显出善行的榜样，在教训上要正直，端庄，

lineList.en: Sound speech, that cannot be condemned; that he that is of the contrary part may be ashamed, having no evil thing to say of you.
lineList.cn: 言语纯全，无可指责，叫那反对的人，既无处可说我们的不是，便自觉羞愧。

lineList.en: Exhort servants to be obedient unto their own masters, and to please them well in all things; not answering again;
lineList.cn: 劝仆人要顺服自己的主人，凡事讨他的喜欢。不可顶撞他。

lineList.en: Not purloining, but shewing all good fidelity; that they may adorn the doctrine of God our Saviour in all things.
lineList.cn: 不可私拿东西。要显为忠诚，以致凡事尊荣我们救主神的道。

lineList.en: For the grace of God that bringeth salvation hath appeared to all men,
lineList.cn: 因为神救众人的恩典，已经显明出来，

lineList.en: Teaching us that, denying ungodliness and worldly lusts, we should live soberly, righteously, and godly, in this present world;
lineList.cn: 教训我们除去不敬虔的心，和世俗的情欲，在今世自守，公义，敬虔度日。

lineList.en: Looking for that blessed hope, and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ;
lineList.cn: 等候所盼望的福，并等候至大的神，和（或作无和字）我们救主耶稣基督的荣耀显现。

lineList.en: Who gave himself for us, that he might redeem us from all iniquity, and purify unto himself a peculiar people, zealous of good works.
lineList.cn: 他为我们舍了自己，要赎我们脱离一切罪恶，又洁净我们，特作自己的子民，热心为善。

lineList.en: These things speak, and exhort, and rebuke with all authority. Let no man despise thee.
lineList.cn: 这些事你要讲明，劝戒人，用各等权柄责备人。不可叫人轻看你。
